summary: A local talk show host organizes an alcoholic professor and a pensioner known for playing Santa Claus to decide whether there was ever a revolution in their town Vaslui.
cast: Mircea Andreescu|Teodor Corban|Ion Sapdaru|Mirela Cioaba|Luminita Gheorghiu|Cristina Ciofu|Lucian Iftime|Annemarie Chertic|Petrica Sapdaru|Catalin Paraschiv|George Guoqingyun|Constantin Dita|Daniel Badale|Marius Rogojinski|Aurelia Tocu|Ion Apostoliu|Ion Ciolacu|Lucian Pinzaru|Corneliu Negrea|Coca Bloos|Cautea Alexandru|Diaconu Victor Alexandru|Danaila Andrei|Mihai Basescu|Avasiloae Marian Catalin|Birzoi Marian Ciprian|Fartanescu Silviu Costel|Popa Daniel|Suru Iulian|Trufia Carmen Lenuja|Vatamanu Remus|Cristea George Robert|Marius Rogojinschi|Talmaciu Romeo|Talmaciu Andra Roxana|Lionte Sergiu|Danaila Tudor|Dula Valentin|Dula Ciprian Vladut
title: 12:08 al este de Bucarest
